subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Putting a stadium, concrete access, traffic jams and another set of users into Flushing Meadows-Corona Park in Queens could be Major League Soccer’s first unredeemable act.
snippet: Putting a stadium, concrete access, traffic jams and another set of users into Flushing Meadows-Corona Park in Queens could be Major League Soccer’s first unredeemable act.
